(Icedemon, do you have any idea how long it would take to repair the autoguns 
and autocannons?  I mean, heh, rebuild?  There aren't exactly enough pieces 
to repair.  They HAVE been scrapped more than three times.  And with just 
Rhinox repairing, I hope you don't think you're repairing everything very 
fast)
